# LLMs.txt for Brayden is tall games 2
# This file provides information about this website for AI language models

## Website Information
- **Name**: Brayden is tall games 2
- **Domain**: https://braydenistallgames.online
- **Type**: Online gaming website
- **Content**: Free browser-based games
- **Language**: English

## Description
Brayden is tall games 2 is a free online gaming platform that offers a wide variety of browser-based games. The site includes action games, puzzle games, racing games, multiplayer games, and more. All games can be played instantly in the browser without requiring downloads.

## Categories of Games Available
- Action Games (1v1.lol, Smash Karts, Drive Mad)
- Puzzle Games (Cookie Clicker, Geometry Lite)
- Racing Games (Traffic Road, Speed Stars, Slow Roads)
- Multiplayer Games (Slender Multiplayer, 1v1.lol)
- Arcade Games (Crossy Road, Basketball Stars)
- Horror Games (Granny)
- Sandbox Games (Melon Sandbox)

## Key Features
- Free to play
- No downloads required
- Browser-based gaming
- Mobile-friendly
- Regular updates with new games
- Safe gaming environment

## Target Audience
- Casual gamers
- Students
- People looking for quick entertainment
- All age groups (family-friendly content)

## Technical Information
- Built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- Responsive design
- Google Analytics integration
- Microsoft Clarity Analytics
- SEO optimized with meta descriptions and proper structure

## Contact Information
- Privacy Policy available at /privacy-policy.html
- No direct contact form (games platform)

- Games are provided for entertainment purposes
- Platform respects user privacy
- Analytics used for improvement purposes only
